title: Academic Listening Test 1 — Campus Life
transcript: You will hear four recordings. Section one is a conversation between two students planning their semester. Section two is a talk given by the accommodation manager. Section three is a tutorial discussion about a research project. Section four is a lecture on renewable energy policies.

questions.prompt: What is the name of the residence hall the student prefers?
Which floor does the friend recommend for quiet study?
How long is the lease offered by the office?
Which utility is not included in the rent?
When is the rent payment due each month?
Which facility has recently been renovated?
How many computers are now available in the digital lab?
What is the name of the new student mentoring program?
Which bus route stops outside the library?
What is the extension number for the counselling service?
Which topic do the students finally choose for their project?
What research method does the tutor insist they include?
How many interviewees do they plan to contact?
When is the first draft due?
Which academic journal does the tutor recommend they read?
Which country achieved net-zero electricity emissions first according to the lecturer?
What percentage of the world's electricity is forecast to come from wind by 2035?
What storage technology is highlighted as the most scalable?
How many pilot tidal turbines are mentioned in the Orkney project?
Which factor is described as the main barrier to offshore wind expansion?
